author: mccreedy
msg: TPF-specific patch to skip fcntl() on sockets.

author: stoddard
msg: Doc changes to go along with the move/rename of CacheMaxStreamingBuffer

author: stoddard
msg: implementation of MCacheMaxStreamingBuffer from mod_cache to
mod_mem_cache. MCacheMaxStreamingBuffer now defaults to the
lesser of 100,000 bytes or MCacheMaxCacheObjectSize. This should
eliminate the need for explicitly coding MCacheMaxStreamingBuffer
